generatedSources.name: #utility.yul

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@dev Proxy contract of Astar Dapp staking pool.
 This contract maintains a ledger that saves users staking information for the Dapp.
 When create this contract instance, a Dapp entity should be setted, and after user
 deposited their SDN to this contract, the contract will stake those asset into the
 Astar Dapp staking contract, so the for the Astar network, the contract address would
 be the real staker, that means the network rewards would be sent to this contract directly.
 Those rewards would be kept in this contract, and user an withdraw their rewards which calculated
 based on their stake amount at any time.

devdoc.details: Proxy contract of Astar Dapp staking pool. This contract maintains a ledger that saves users staking information for the Dapp. When create this contract instance, a Dapp entity should be setted, and after user deposited their SDN to this contract, the contract will stake those asset into the Astar Dapp staking contract, so the for the Astar network, the contract address would be the real staker, that means the network rewards would be sent to this contract directly. Those rewards would be kept in this contract, and user an withdraw their rewards which calculated based on their stake amount at any time.
